entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:25 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:25 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
